overview: Following up on the success of 2014’s “Firesoul” album, German power metallers BRAINSTORM didn’t waste any time entering the studio to record a brand new piece of work - “Scary Creatures”! Alongside their new album, they also released a live DVD of their performance at Essen, Turock, from April 5th 2014, where they once again proved why they are one of the most respected metal acts in the European scene.
title: Brainstorm: Scary Creatures Over Europe
